deals.title: Pure Pitaya Bowl
deals.itemDescription:
Base: organic pitaya (dragon fruit), mango, pineapple, coconut water

Toppings: blueberries, strawberries, hemp granola

The Pure Pitaya bowl is made with pitaya, a.k.a dragon fruit which gives the base a vibrant bright pink color and is combined with mango, pineapple and a touch of banana. This bowl is topped with blueberries, strawberries and organic hemp granola.

itemDescriptionBadge.text:

Toppings: blueberries, strawberries, hemp granola

This bowl is topped with blueberries, strawberries and organic hemp granola.

deals.title: Pure Pina Colada Smoothie
deals.itemDescription:
Pineapple, coconut butter and coconut water.

The Pure Pina Colada Smoothie is our take a healthy version of the pina colada Pure Green style. The flavor depth comes from coconut butter, the flesh of the coconut.

itemDescriptionBadge.text:

deals.title: Tropical Breeze Smoothie
deals.itemDescription:
Mango, pineapple, coconut butter, almond milk and orange juice.

The Tropical Breeze Smoothie is a tropical blend that is designed to taste like a healthy orange creamsicle and very high in Vitamin C.

itemDescriptionBadge.text:

deals.title: Pink Dragon Smoothie
deals.itemDescription:
Pitaya (dragon fruit), mango, pineapple, coconut butter, coconut water and almond milk.

The Pink Dragon Smoothie has a bright vibrant pink color from the pitaya which not only gives it an intense color but the antioxidant level is off the charts.

itemDescriptionBadge.text:

deals.title: Coconut Chia Acai Bowl
deals.itemDescription:
Base: acai, mango, pineapple, banana, coconut water

Toppings: apple, blueberries, chia seeds, coconut, hemp granola.

The Coconut Chia Acai Bowl is a blend of organic acai sourced from the amazon rainforest and blended with mangoes, pineapples and a touch of bananas for a tropical base and topped with sliced apples, blueberries, chia seeds, shredded coconut flakes and organic hemp granola.

itemDescriptionBadge.text:
